1.title: Happy Haunting

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Alex, Nancy, and Michael have just died and must now figure out the rules of what they can and can't do as ghosts.

2.title: Til Death Do Us Part

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Nancy and Michael are confronted with the idea that they might not be married anymore now that they are dead. Meanwhile, Alex tries hard not to scare Spencer and gets stuck in a very messy situation.

3.title: A Necromantic Evening

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Spencer calls a paranormal investigator to help get rid of his ghost problem. Meanwhile, Nancy and Michael get a chance to communicate with Tyler and Taylor through a board game.

4.title: Medium-Well

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Spencer receives help from an eccentric medium. Meanwhile, Nancy and Michael deal with post-marriage jealousy.

5.title: Picturing the Consequences

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Nancy and Michael get caught on camera and must get it back before Tyler and Taylor see it. Meanwhile, Spencer goes through desperate measures to rid himself of Alex for good.

6.title: Say My Name B*Tch

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Michael and Nancy find a way to be seen at the Halloween party Tyler and Taylor throw. Meanwhile, Alex tries getting Spencer to say his name three times in hopes that he will appear in front of him.

7.title: Caught in the Act

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: Alex deals with a break-in at the apartment. Meanwhile, Nancy and Michael set a trap for Tyler and Taylor.

8.title: An Exorcism of Sorts

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Spencer and Alex are visited by an exorcist. Meanwhile, a marriage counselor with very strange methods helps Tyler and Taylor deal with their growing marital problems.

9.title: Giving Up and Giving In

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Nancy and Michael attempt to fix Tyler and Taylor's relationship. Meanwhile, Alex tries using white noise to communicate with Spencer, but his plans are once again halted by the presence of Spencer's pesky girlfriend.

10.title: Life as We Knew It

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

10.plot: A look back at Alex, Nancy, and Michael's final moments before they died.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: Nancy and Michael give one last attempt at scaring Tyler and Taylor out of the house for good. Meanwhile, Spencer moves out of his apartment, leaving Alex alone...forever?

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Death as We Know It (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: The two-part series finale concludes as Nancy and Michael desperately try to move-on to the afterlife. Meanwhile, Alex learns an important truth about how he died.

imdb.plot outline: "Death As We Know It" is a comedic web-series following the lives (or deaths, rather) of three recently deceased ghosts spread out between two households. Not only do these ghosts have to deal with the human problems of the people they now haunt, but they also have to discover what it takes to move on from purgatory and figure out how to live even in death.
imdb.title: Death as We Know It
akas: Death as We Know It (United States)
plot: "Death As We Know It" is a comedic web-series following the lives (or deaths, rather) of three recently deceased ghosts spread out between two households. Not only do these ghosts have to deal with the human problems of the people they now haunt, but they also have to discover what it takes to move on from purgatory and figure out how to live even in death.::Unsinkable Productions
